trans-unit.source: Converts instances of the <xref:System.String> type to and from <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> instances.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a class can be converted from a given type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se uma classe pode ser convertida a partir de um determinado tipo para uma instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter> supports conversion to and from the <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter>suporta a conversão de e para o <xref:System.String>tipo.</xref:System.String></xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> can be converted to a different type.
trans-unit.target: Determina se uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> pode ser convertido para um tipo diferente.

trans-unit.source: Conversion is possible only if `context` is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> type, and `destinationType` is a <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: A conversão é possível apenas se `context` é um <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>tipo, e `destinationType` é um <xref:System.String>tipo.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A> property for `context` cannot be null or equal to <xref:System.String.Empty>, which identifies `context` as an anonymous <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A>propriedade `context` não pode ser nulo nem igual a <xref:System.String.Empty>, que identifica `context` como um <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> anónimo</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A>
